name: The Lexiliberloquicon of Whomitt Mayconcern
description:
*PLEASE PLAY IN FULL SCREEN WITH SOUND ON*

~ARROW KEYS~

*PROJECT IN PROGRESS,  MORE SPIT AND POLISH REQUIRED*1/11/2020

Basically, I'm tired of sitting on this. There's more scenes, but I haven't done the music for them yet - and whilst I'm happy to duplicate the music from the first scene for the second scene,  I don't really want more placeholders than that.  I've got a bunch of stuff I've got to be working on for the next couple of months as well, so there will be expansions and updates to this coming later. Any feedback would be super helpful!

In case you're having trouble - YOU WANT THE BEEPING TO BE FASTER AND HIGHER.
